i work as a legal assistant in a law firm that basically only handles real estate work.
I prefer to live in the suburbs so I can have a backyard for my dogs.
I write about my travels and experiences.
everyday after work i buy my dog a dog biscuit.

participant_2.background:

i do not treat my girlfriend very well.

I'll start my day by responding to messages from potential dates.

content.text: I love sports cars and video games. I'm also a creative person who uses art to process my emotions.
I love dogs too! I have two of them. They're always there to greet me when I come home from work.
Aww, that's so cute! I don't have any pets, but I've always wanted a dog.
What kind of art do you create?
Mostly paintings and drawings. I also like to do some sculpting.
That sounds awesome! I'm not very artistic, but I enjoy looking at art.
What do you do for work?
I'm a legal assistant in a law firm that mainly handles real estate work.
Oh, that sounds interesting! Do you like your job?
I do, it's pretty challenging and I get to learn a lot.
Cool! I'm in a local theater company. I love acting and performing.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to try acting, but I'm not sure I'm brave enough.
You should definitely give it a try! It's a lot of fun.
